changes.change: Boss in pull indicator now shows the name of the boss(es) in the tooltip.
Reduced the amount of pages being cached - should reduce resource usage and increase performance (yeah).
Having empty pulls in your route and generating a SimulationCraft string should no longer sometimes cause a crash.
Having an empty pull between two pulls where a floor switch occurs, no longer removes the floor listing from the pull window.
Explore pages for speedrun dungeons no longer show required NPCs in an unstyled frame.
Current season now has 8 affixes instead of 4 (I missed that it didn't roll over after 4 last week but there's probably 8 or more affix rotations this season).
